groups.name: Golaub Dairy Farm Recovery
groups.description: Hurricane recovery project to restore pasture and fencing. The 35-acre farm has lost significant livestock (30 cows, 7 calves out of original 33 cows, 10 calves). Currently has 3 cows, 2 heifers, and 3 calves remaining.

projects.title: Pasture Clearance & Access Restoration
projects.description:
Clear fallen trees and debris from pasture to allow grass to grow and restore cow access. Trees have fallen down in the pasture preventing grass from growing. Cows cannot access the grass.

Work includes:
1. Power saw work - Cut medium size tree branches and limbs
2. Remove fallen trees from pasture
3. Clear area to allow grass to grow
4. Manual labor for chainsaw work, machete work, and moving posts (lift 20-30lbs)
projects.notes: Farm size: 35 acres. Livestock loss: 30 cows, 7 calves. Remaining: 3 cows, 2 heifers, 3 calves.

projects.title: Boundary & Fence Restoration
projects.description: Install and repair fencing to restore farm boundaries and secure livestock. Requires 5 rolls of barb wire, staples, and 500 posts.
projects.notes: Farm size: 35 acres. Livestock loss: 30 cows, 7 calves. Remaining: 3 cows, 2 heifers, 3 calves.
